'''Kevin Eldon''' ( b. [[1960]], [[Chatham, Kent|Chatham]], [[Kent]], [[England]] ) is an [[England|English]] comic [[actor]]. Although he predominantly plays [[character actor|character]] roles, he has appeared prominently in several of the most critically-acclaimed [[United Kingdom|British]] [[comedy]] [[television]] shows of the [[1990s]], notably ''[[Fist of Fun]]'', ''[[I'm Alan Partridge]]'', ''[[Big Train]]'', ''[[Brass Eye]]'' and ''[[Jam (TV series)|Jam]]''.
'''Kevin Eldon''' ( b. [[1960]], [[Chatham, Kent|Chatham]], [[Kent]], [[England]] ) is an [[England|English]] comic [[actor]]. Although he predominantly plays [[character actor|character]] roles, he has appeared prominently in several of the most critically-acclaimed [[United Kingdom|British]] [[comedy]] [[television]] shows of the [[1990s]], notably ''[[Fist of Fun]]'', ''[[I'm Alan Partridge]]'', ''[[Big Train]]'', ''[[Brass Eye]]'' and ''[[Jam (TV series)|Jam]]''.
